lead_paragraph: Patrick Reed, Rickie Fowler and J.B. Holmes are competing for the United States’ last automatic spots. Henrik Stenson, the British Open champion, withdrew after the first round with a knee injury.

headline.print_headline: Jockeying for the Lead and a Ryder Cup Spot
headline.main: At the Barclays Tournament, Jostling for Ryder Cup Spots Raises the Stakes

snippet: Patrick Reed, Rickie Fowler and J.B. Holmes are competing for the United States’ last automatic spots. Henrik Stenson, the British Open champion, withdrew after the first round with a knee injury....
abstract: Patrick Reed and Martin Laird share first-round lead at Barclays golf tournament; Rickie Fowler, No. 8 player in world, is one shot behind leaders at four-under-par 67, score that puts him tied for third place; Barclays is last opportunity for players to place in top eight worldwide, which leads to automatic Ryder Cup qualification.
